cordio-cfg-max-syncs.help: Maximum number of periodic advertising synchronizations

cordio-cfg-max-advertising-sets.help: Number of supported advertising sets: must be set to 1 for legacy advertising

cordio-cfg-max-phys.help: Number of scanner and initiator PHYs (LE 1M, LE 2M and LE Coded): must be set to 1 for legacy scanner and initiator

cordio-cfg-max-l2cap-channels.help: Maximum number of connection oriented channels

cordio-cfg-max-l2cap-clients.help: Maximum number of connection oriented channel registered clients

cordio-cfg-max-att-writes.help: Maximum number of simultaneous ATT write commands

cordio-cfg-max-att-notifications.help: Maximum number of simultaneous ATT notifications

cordio-cfg-max-smp-devices.help: Max number of devices in the security database

cordio-cfg-desired-att-mtu.help: Desired ATT_MTU, this needs to be between 23 and 517 (inclusive).

cordio-cfg-max-prepared-writes.help: Number of queued prepare writes supported by server.
